definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Angola is under its post-war reconstruction with everything waiting to be taken up.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉正在进行战后重建工作，百废待兴。

sentences.english: Cashmere goats are usually larger than Angoras.
sentences.chinese: 喀什米尔羊通常比安哥拉羊大。

sentences.english: Angoras may need special protection from the coat cold for about a month after shearing.
sentences.chinese: 割毛后，安哥拉山羊需要大约一个月的特殊保暖措施。

sentences.english: Possibly from Kwanza, a river of Angola .
sentences.chinese: 可能源自宽扎，安哥拉一河流。

sentences.english: Angola has one of the worst Gini coefficients in the world.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉是世界上基尼系数最不容乐观的国家之一。

sentences.english: But at the same time as mild as an Angora cat, a species which I prefer.
sentences.chinese: 同时又温顺如安哥拉小猫，我更喜欢这种猫。

sentences.english: The Serra da Leba Road near Lubango (Huíla, Angola).
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉卢班戈附近的萨拉达莱巴公路。

sentences.english: An outbreak of a disease of unknown etiology is currently ongoing in Cacuaco municipality, Angola.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉卡瓜科市目前正在爆发一种病因不明的疾病。

sentences.english: He served in the Angolan war against Swapo and the Cubans.
sentences.chinese: 他曾参加了西南非民族和古巴人对抗安哥拉的战争。

sentences.english: Angola, like Brazil, is a former Portuguese colony.
sentences.chinese: 和巴西一样，安哥拉曾是葡萄牙的殖民地。

sentences.english: Angola lead the way, our team is our people.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉带路，我们的球队就是我们的人民。

sentences.english: Angolan boys play football in Lobito village January 14.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉男孩踢足球，在洛比托村1月14日。

sentences.english: Cashmere goats are usually larger than Angoras .
sentences.chinese: 喀什米尔山羊通常比安哥拉山羊体形要大。

sentences.english: Church of the Holy Apostles, Ancient Agora, Athens, Greece.
sentences.chinese: 教堂，古安哥拉遗址，雅典，希腊。

sentences.english: WHO has placed urgent orders for disinfectants, which are currently in short supply in Angola.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织已紧急订购目前在安哥拉供应短缺的消毒剂。

sentences.english: The hosts Angola have been playing Mali in the opening game.
sentences.chinese: 在揭幕战中，东道主安哥拉队对战马里队。
